sub_title: Renewable energy | Energy efficiency | Mechanical engineer
summary:
I am a professional passionate all the different ways to implement renewable energies and energy efficiency. I have 12 years of experience, with experience and knowledge in areas of energy efficiency, solar energy, engineering and commissioning. logistics, sourcing, process marketing
Having worked in large and small companies I have skills to integrate teams and processes objectively and focused on results.

profile_positions.description: Work intended to accelerate the learning of the Dutch language and culture.
profile_positions.title: Shop Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Assisted Project planning of maintenance service of Gas/Steam turbines.
•	Supplied tools and consumables for maintenance outages of Gas turbines.
•	Managed the operations, inventory, and projects fulfilment of the Tool Centre Brazil, coordinating a multifunctional team.
•	Plan and execution of national and international Outbound and Inbound operations.
•	Management of annual budget (about USD 2M)
•	Modified the structure of the sector in Brazil, merging units and processes and relocated the operation, achieving a 50% cost reduction.
•	Cost management with elaboration of annual expense plans.
•	Control of OTD and other operational metrics.
•	Implemented SAP - ETM module in the department and trained the team on the software.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer | Tooling coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Performed technical evaluations, project design and execution overview.
•	Drafted projects, calculations, and technical schemes.
•	Handled different interested parts, from clients to installation team.
•	Planned and overviewed on-site execution
•	Generated new business and negotiated contract in the residential and commercial sectors.
•	Cost control and economical management.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer | Co-owner

profile_positions.location: São Caetano do Sul, São Paulo
profile_positions.description:
•	Evaluated client’s processes and infrastructure aiming to improve the overall energy efficiency improvements by acting on equipment, process, infrastructure, or energy contracts with reduction of energy and cost reduction up to 60%.
•	Selected and quoted equipment focused on the specific needs of each project, involving the evaluation of the contract and energy consumption, in addition to the analysis of the company's processes and the review of critical equipment and their respective performances.
•	Prepared reports related to expected performance, investment and return on improvement projects through the selection, recommendation, and budget of equipment.
•	Management and execution of the financial evaluation to obtain the results.
profile_positions.title: Process engineer | Energy efficiency consultant
